definition: orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu

sentences.english: Top notes include bamboo leaf, litchi, Bulgarian rose and violet.
sentences.chinese: 前調有竹葉，荔枝，保加利亞玫瑰和紫羅蘭。

sentences.english: The aroma is a complex mix of blackcurrant with liquor ice and violets with hints of a cigar box.
sentences.chinese: 香氣是一種混合黑醋栗帶有紫羅蘭和雪茄盒子的感覺。

sentences.english: Her parents teach physics at the university level.
sentences.chinese: 羅蘭的父母都是大學物理老師。

sentences.english: All the time, he savoured the gillyflowers in full bloom under my windows.
sentences.chinese: 他一直聞着盛開在我窗下的紫羅蘭花香氣。

sentences.english: Michael confronts Roland about setting them up, but he denies it.
sentences.chinese: 邁克爾逼問是否羅蘭德出賣了他們，他抵死不認。

sentences.english: The car was parked on the driveway of Toon team-mate Kevin Nolan's house at the time.
sentences.chinese: 卡羅爾的汽車當時正停在他隊友羅蘭的房子附近。

sentences.english: A beautiful bright red colour with violet hints.
sentences.chinese: 酒體呈紅寶石色，略顯紫羅蘭的光澤。

sentences.english: Mme Roland is indifferent to posterity.
sentences.chinese: 羅蘭夫人於是對後代的問題也冷淡漠然。

sentences.english: Valoran's easternmost pole is bitterly cold and covered in ice.
sentences.chinese: 在瓦羅蘭的最東面，是被冰雪覆蓋的寒冷極地。

sentences.english: Improving and ameliorating the ability of Loran-C for time service are the main objective of our study in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本論文的主要研究目的是提高和改進羅蘭C授時能力。

sentences.english: Creamy agate snuff bottle with two small ears on the shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 紫羅蘭色瑪瑙鼻菸壺，肩上小耳。

sentences.english: Calendula may mix with lemon slice, peppermint, blue mallow or Verbena.
sentences.chinese: 金盞花可配搭檸檬片，薄荷，紫羅蘭或馬鞭草。

sentences.english: Purple color, with definite purple-violet lights.
sentences.chinese: 紫色酒體，透出一抹紫羅蘭色的光澤。

sentences.english: The the thrushes they were warbling , The violets they were charming.
sentences.chinese: 畫眉鳥柔和的唱着歌，還有那嬌媚的紫羅蘭競相開放。

sentences.english: Laure is a lovely French girl of 22 years old.
sentences.chinese: 羅蘭是一個可愛的法國女孩，今年22歲。

sentences.english: The others arrive in Las Vegas, and Roland is eyed by casino security.
sentences.chinese: 其他隊員抵達了維加斯，羅蘭德被賭場保安注意上了。

definition: Hill (name)/Christopher Hill, US undersecretary of state of East Asian affairs
Werther, opera by Jules Massenet/Werther, German masculine given name
Dole (name)/Bob Dole (1923-), US Republican politician, Kansas senator 1969-1996
